Class GameServerConnector

java.lang.Object
edu.io.net.client.GameServerConnector
public class GameServerConnector extends Object
Represents the main entry point for game networking.

Manages communication between the game client and the remote server and provides a high-level API to:

  • establish and close connections,
  • send commands,
  • dispatch incoming commands and responses.

Two internal state indicators are maintained:

  • State — whether the connector is connected or disconnected,
  • Status — result of the last operation, consumed by onSuccess(Runnable) and onFailure(Runnable).

Instances of this class are typically injected into game logic components that require network interaction.

Supports sending commands with optional response handlers bound to unique command IDs.

Thread safety: response dispatching to pending command handlers is thread-safe, but callers must ensure thread-safe handling of any shared state inside callbacks.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameServerConnector

      public GameServerConnector(@NotNull @NotNull String connStr)
      Creates a new GameServerConnector with a stub network connector that does not perform real communication.

      Expected connection string format: userid@host:port

      Parameters:
      connStr - connection string identifying the remote server

    • GameServerConnector

      public GameServerConnector(@NotNull @NotNull String connString, @NotNull @NotNull NetworkConnector netConnector)
      Creates a new GameServerConnector with a custom network connector.

      Connection string must contain a host and a positive port. User info is allowed but not interpreted.

      Parameters:
      connString - RFC 2396–compliant connection string, e.g. user@localhost:8080
      netConnector - low-level network connector
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the connection string is invalid

  • Method Details

    • isConnected

      public boolean isConnected()
      Checks whether the connector is currently connected.
      Returns:
      true if connected; false otherwise

    • connect

      public GameServerConnector connect()
      Attempts to establish a connection to the server.

      Registers a handler dispatching incoming commands to their matching pending responses or to the general handler.

      On failure, no exception is thrown. State is set to DISCONNECTED, status to ERROR.

      Returns:
      this connector for method chaining

    • disconnect

      public GameServerConnector disconnect()
      Closes the connection to the server.

      If an error occurs, state remains DISCONNECTED and status becomes ERROR. No exception is thrown.

      Returns:
      this connector for method chaining

    • issueCommand

      public GameServerConnector issueCommand(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd)
      Sends a command to the server without expecting a response.

      On failure, wraps the underlying exception in a RuntimeException and sets status to ERROR.

      Parameters:
      cmd - command to send
      Returns:
      this connector for method chaining
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if sending fails

    • issueCommand

      public GameServerConnector issueCommand(@NotNull @NotNull Command cmd, @NotNull @NotNull Consumer<Command> onResponse)
      Sends a command to the server and registers a callback for its response.

      The callback is registered only after the command has been successfully sent. If sending fails, the callback is not stored and the exception is propagated.

      Parameters:
      cmd - command to send
      onResponse - callback invoked when a response with the same ID is received
      Returns:
      this connector for method chaining
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if sending fails

    • onCmdFromServer

      public GameServerConnector onCmdFromServer(@NotNull @NotNull Consumer<Command> cmdHandler)
      Registers a general handler for all incoming commands that do not match any pending command ID.

      Replaces the previously registered handler.

      If no handler is provided, unmatched commands are ignored.

      Parameters:
      cmdHandler - callback for incoming commands
      Returns:
      this connector for method chaining

    • onSuccess

      public GameServerConnector onSuccess(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable action)
      Executes the given action if the last operation succeeded.

      After invocation, status is reset to NONE.

      Parameters:
      action - runnable executed on success
      Returns:
      this connector for method chaining

    • onFailure

      public GameServerConnector onFailure(@NotNull @NotNull Runnable action)
      Executes the given action if the last operation failed.

      After invocation, status is reset to NONE.

      Parameters:
      action - runnable executed on failure
      Returns:
      this connector for method chaining
